vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2155 for a recycling buy-back center for the collection of household and industrial metals on property zoned an IM Industrial Manufacturing District, on the southwest line of Botham Jean Boulevard, between Martin Luther King, Jr. Boulevard and Lenway Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a two-year period, subject to amended conditions
Z223-222(LG)
